name: Samantha Wylie
text: Just bring back the old app already! How many more people do you need to tell you how bad this is? Travelling with a family with multiple passes, the boarding pass in app was one of the best features. Now there's Wallet 1 by 1 and that is failing with an error. It was so easy to change flights before. Presumably someone has decided to save costs by only having a website to maintain but you may as well not have an app in that case! it's now quicker to download passes to Wallet from the website..

name: Frank Southee
text: The old App was a well polished, slick, easy user experience. The new App is sluggish, counter-intuitive, and honestly just flat out broken. easyJet, if you care a jot about your customer experience, please roll back the app to the old version because the current experience is terrible.

name: Maria Johnson
text: I absolutely love the new update! The interface is clean, intuitive, and visually appealing. Navigation is a breeze and the new features are exactly what I've been waiting for. Five stars all the way!
